Yay! Sailing!

Posted on Tuesday, July 27, 2004

Looks like I’ll finally get to do some of the sailing I wanted to do this summer. This weekend I’m planning on sailing some Laser sailing this weekend in Hyannis, MA and then hopefully I’ll sail BBR (Buzzards Bay Regatta) the following weekend in V-15s.

Wish me luck and for watch for results!
